name: ChatProp
author: ChatProp

sections.description:
ChatProp is a cloud-based SaaS solution that acts as an AI-powered real estate assistant, engaging visitors, recommending properties, and automating lead management. This plugin integrates ChatProp’s services into WordPress websites.

External Services

This plugin relies on external services provided by ChatProp to function. Specifically, it uses the following external APIs and remote assets:

  1. ChatProp Web Application: https://app.chatprop.io
    This service is used to connect the WordPress site with ChatProp’s AI chatbot for real estate property recommendations and lead management.

  2. ChatProp Functions API: https://functions.chatprop.io
    This service handles communication between the WordPress plugin and the ChatProp backend for syncing and managing property items and leads.

  3. Remote JavaScript and CSS:
    In order to ensure that users always have access to the latest features and updates, the ChatProp plugin remotely loads JavaScript and CSS from our secure servers. These assets are essential for providing up-to-date functionality, security patches, and dynamic content updates without requiring manual updates to the plugin code.

  • JavaScript: https://app.chatprop.io/chatbot/scripts/chatprop.js

  • CSS: https://app.chatprop.io/chatbot/scripts/chatprop.styles.css

    Why Remote Files?
    ChatProp operates as a dynamic SaaS platform, and loading these files remotely ensures that all users receive the most current version of the chatbot interface. This allows us to:

  • Deliver new features and improvements automatically.
  • Ensure the latest bug fixes and security patches are applied.

  • Provide seamless integration with our cloud-based services.

    These remote files are essential to the operation of the service and are hosted on our secure servers to maintain the integrity and functionality of the plugin.

Privacy Policy & Terms of Service

  • Privacy Policy
  • Terms of Service

By using this plugin, you agree to the terms of service and privacy policy of ChatProp.

How the Plugin Works

The plugin connects to ChatProp’s servers to synchronize property data, manage lead information, and allow AI-based property suggestions to be displayed on the website.

Key Features:

  • Smart Property Recommendations: Provide personalized property suggestions based on visitor preferences, helping to increase engagement and conversions.
  • Lead Pre-Qualification: Automatically collect and qualify leads using ChatProp’s AI, allowing you to focus on the most serious prospects.
  • Schedule Showings: Integrated calendar feature for scheduling property showings directly through the chat, reducing no-shows and missed opportunities.
  • All-in-One CRM: Manage visitor information and interactions in a central SaaS-based CRM, making it easy to track leads and follow up.

With ChatProp, real estate professionals can automate property suggestions, lead qualification, and appointment scheduling through AI while benefiting from a fully managed SaaS infrastructure.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. See the LICENSE file for more details.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly or manually upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/chatprop directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Follow the flow to signup and set up your account on our site.
sections.faq:
Is ChatProp free to use?

ChatProp offers a free plan, allowing up to 20 conversations per month. For additional conversations and advanced features, you can upgrade to a paid plan.

How does ChatProp recommend properties?

ChatProp uses AI-driven algorithms to analyze visitor preferences and recommend properties tailored to their needs.

How do I connect ChatProp to my site?

After installing the plugin, you’ll need to log in or create an account on the ChatProp platform. Once connected, the plugin will communicate with the ChatProp SaaS platform to offer its services.

Is my data stored securely?

Yes, ChatProp adheres to the highest standards of data security. All visitor information and interactions are securely stored on our SaaS platform, which is fully compliant with data privacy regulations, including GDPR.

How do I manage my leads and appointments?

All leads, visitor interactions, and scheduled appointments are managed via the ChatProp SaaS dashboard, which can be accessed from any device.

short_description: AI real estate agent that engages website visitors, recommends properties, and automates lead management.

upgrade_notice.1.0: First stable release. Install the plugin to automate property recommendations, lead qualification, and appointment scheduling through ChatProp’s SaaS platform.
